entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except southeast 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and this afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
